ai-clinical-workflow-presentation

A Practical AI Tech Stack for Physicians Who Code

View Live Demo View on GitHub

üöÄ Live Presentation

üìñ About This Presentation

This interactive presentation explores the future of clinical documentation through a three-component AI workflow:

  1. üé§ Ambient Transcription - Capturing clinical encounters passively
    1. üß† EvidenceMD - Contextual clinical reasoning with large context windows
      1. üíº CodeCraftMD - Automated billing and compliance

        2. The presentation demonstrates how physician-developers can build AI-powered workflows that reduce administrative friction while preserving clinical judgment.

üéØ Key Topics Covered

  • ‚úÖ The shift from search to reasoning in clinical AI
    • ‚úÖ Building an end-to-end ambient ‚Üí reasoning ‚Üí billing pipeline
      • ‚úÖ Technical architecture for physician-developers
        • ‚úÖ Real-world implementation in maternal-fetal medicine practice
          • ‚úÖ Full tech stack recommendations (React, FastAPI, FHIR, etc.)

üõ†Ô∏è Built With

  • Reveal.js - HTML presentation framework
    • GitHub Pages - Free hosting
      • Custom styling - Healthcare-focused color scheme

üì± Navigation

  • Arrow keys - Navigate between slides
    • Space - Next slide
      • ESC - Slide overview
        • F - Fullscreen
          • S - Speaker notes (if available)
            • ? - Keyboard shortcuts help

üöÄ Quick Start (For Local Development)

1. Clone this repository


git clone https://github.com/YOUR-USERNAME/ai-clinical-workflow-presentation.git
cd ai-clinical-workflow-presentation

2. Open in browser

Simply open index.html in your web browser:


# On macOS
open index.html

# On Linux
xdg-open index.html

# On Windows
start index.html

3. Or use a local server


# Using Python
python -m http.server 8000

# Using Node.js
npx http-server

# Then visit http://localhost:8000

üì§ Deploying to GitHub Pages

Automatic Deployment

  1. Push your changes to the `main` branch
    1. Go to Settings ‚Üí Pages
      1. Under Source, select `main` branch
        1. Click Save
          1. Wait 1-2 minutes for deployment
            1. Visit `https://YOUR-USERNAME.github.io/ai-clinical-workflow-presentation/`

              2. Custom Domain (Optional)

              1. Create a `CNAME` file in the root directory:

                2. `

                presentation.doctorswhocode.com

                `

                1. Configure DNS at your domain registrar:

                  2. - Add a CNAME record pointing to YOUR-USERNAME.github.io

                  1. Enable HTTPS in GitHub Pages settings

üé® Customization

Change Theme

In index.html, modify this line:


<link rel="stylesheet" href="dist/theme/black.css">
  • `black.css` (current)
    • `white.css`
      • `league.css`
        • `beige.css`
          • `sky.css`
            • `night.css`
              • `serif.css`
                • `simple.css`
                  • `solarized.css`

                    • Modify Slides

                    Edit the content within the

                    section in index.html.

                    Each slide is wrapped in

                    tags:

                    
<section>
    <h2>Your Slide Title</h2>
    <p>Your content here</p>
</section>

                    For vertical slides (sub-slides):

                    
<section>
    <section>Main slide</section>
    <section>Sub-slide 1</section>
    <section>Sub-slide 2</section>
</section>

                    Add Fragments (Incremental Reveals)

                    
<ul>
    <li class="fragment">Appears first</li>
    <li class="fragment">Appears second</li>
    <li class="fragment">Appears third</li>
</ul>

üìä Export to PDF

  1. Add `?print-pdf` to the URL:

    2. `

    http://localhost:8000/?print-pdf

    `

    1. Open print dialog (Ctrl/Cmd + P)
      1. Set destination to "Save as PDF"
        1. Set margins to "None"
          1. Enable "Background graphics"
            1. Save
